title: [HOLD for payment 2024-12-20] [$250] Add header description to Concierge chat

## Problem We've had multiple instance in our testing of people not knowing what Concierge is. Some think it's related to AI in some way. This causes them to miss out on one of the best features of Expensify. ## Solution Add a small description in the header of the Concierge chat like we do on Self DM: ![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c5cd89a3-3696-4123-9331-04c4fa725ac5) cc @Expensify/design @jamesdeanexpensify
